Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.storemigration

Class DirectRecordStoreMigrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.kernel.impl.storemigration.DirectRecordStoreMigrator
  • class DirectRecordStoreMigrator
extends Object
    Idea is to migrate a NeoStores store by store, record by record in a sequential fashion for quick migration from one RecordFormats to another.

      • withPersistedStoreHeadersAsConfigFrom

        private Config withPersistedStoreHeadersAsConfigFrom​(NeoStores legacyStores,
                                                     StoreType[] types)
        Creates a configuration to include dynamic record store sizes where data size in old a new format will be the same. This is important because we're doing a record-to-record migration and so data which fits into one record must fit into the other as to not needing additional blocks in the dynamic record chain.
        Parameters:
        legacyStores - NeoStores to read dynamic record data sizes from.
        types - array of StoreType which we know that legacy stores have opened.
        Returns:
        a Config which mimics dynamic record data sizes from the legacyStores.
